required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Dose Escalation and Expansion Study Of SHR7280 In Subjects With Hormone Sensitive Prostate Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Dose Escalation And Expansion Study Of SHR7280 In Subjects With Hormone Sensitive Prostate Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, multicenter, dose escalation and expansion Phase 1 study of SHR7280 in adult patients with hormone sensitive prostate cancer.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration time curve in the dosing interval AUC(TAU) of SHR7280
Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) of SHR7280
Observed trough plasma concentration (Ctrough) of SHR7280
Time of maximum observed plasma concentration (Tmax) of SHR7280
Time to Achieve Testosterone Concentrations < 50 ng/dL
Percentage of Participants With Effective Castration Rate Over 24 Weeks
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of Week 5 to Day 1 of Week 25

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Effective Castration Rate Over 48 Weeks
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of Week 5 to Day 1 of Week 49

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Serum Prostate-Specific Antigen Concentration Change frome Baseline at the End of Weeks 4, 8, 12

intervention.description: Drug: SHR7280 All participants receive SHR7280 alone.
